footer.tagline: High-quality pet food and supplies for the health and happiness of your pets.

homepage.heroSubtitle: Unlock your dog's potential with our scientifically formulated, premium-quality food. Because a healthy dog is a happy dog.
homepage.productsCardSubtitle: Explore our curated collection of premium products for your best friend.
homepage.whyChooseUsSubtitle: We are dedicated to providing your dog with the highest quality nutrition, crafted from natural ingredients to support their health and vitality at every stage of life.
homepage.naturalIngredientsText: Our formulas are made with carefully selected, wholesome ingredients, free from artificial colors, flavors, or preservatives.
homepage.scientificallyFormulatedText: Developed by veterinarians and nutritionists to meet the specific needs of dogs for optimal health.
homepage.trustedQualityText: We adhere to the strictest quality control standards to ensure every bag of food is safe and nutritious.

product_descriptions.prod_47231: Complete grain-free dry food with lamb, for adult small and mini breed dogs with white coats. Formulated to help remove tear stains and maintain a bright white coat.
product_descriptions.prod_45834: Complete food for adult dogs of all breeds. Specially formulated to support healthy skin and a shiny coat, rich in omega fatty acids.
product_descriptions.prod_45835: Complete food for growing puppies of all breeds. Provides all the necessary nutrients for healthy development, strong bones, and a robust immune system.
product_descriptions.prod_45829: Complete food for adult small breed dogs. A balanced formula to meet the high energy needs of small dogs while supporting their overall health.
product_descriptions.prod_45830: Complete food for growing small breed puppies. Enriched with essential vitamins and minerals for optimal growth and development in the early stages of life.
product_descriptions.prod_45671: Grain-free dry food with salmon and krill for sterilised adult dogs. Helps maintain a healthy weight and supports urinary tract health.
product_descriptions.prod_47592: Complete dry food with insects for small breed puppies with white coats. A hypoallergenic and sustainable protein source, ideal for sensitive puppies.
product_descriptions.prod_45662: Dry food for small breed dogs, with salmon. A tasty and easily digestible formula that supports skin and coat health.
product_descriptions.prod_45661: Dry food for small breed dogs, with lamb. A classic choice for dogs with sensitive digestive systems, providing high-quality protein.
product_descriptions.prod_45666: Complete food with lamb meat, for adult large breed dogs. Formulated to support joint health and maintain muscle mass.
product_descriptions.prod_45667: Complete food for growing large breed puppies. Supports controlled growth to prevent skeletal issues, with added nutrients for joint protection.
product_descriptions.prod_45663: Complete food for adult large breed dogs. Made with poultry for a highly digestible and palatable meal that provides sustained energy.
product_descriptions.prod_70012: Dry starter food for puppies (3-16 weeks) with white coats. An easily digestible formula to support the transition from mother's milk to solid food.
product_descriptions.prod_70010: Grain-free dry food with salmon for puppies with white coats. Rich in Omega-3 to support brain development and maintain a bright coat.
product_descriptions.prod_63999: Grain-free dry food with herring for adult small breed dogs with white coats. A unique protein source that helps reduce the risk of allergies.
product_descriptions.prod_15119: Grain-free dry food with salmon for adult small breed dogs with red coats. Specially formulated with amino acids to enhance and maintain a vibrant red coat color.
product_descriptions.prod_47230: Grain-free dry food with salmon for adult small and mini breed dogs with white coats. Helps prevent tear stains and supports skin health.
product_descriptions.prod_47232: Grain-free dry food with insects for adult small and mini breed dogs with white coats. A sustainable and hypoallergenic option for sensitive dogs.
product_descriptions.prod_47654: Grain-free dry food with lamb for adult small breed dogs with red coats. Designed to enhance the red pigment in the coat while being gentle on the stomach.
product_descriptions.prod_45735: Hypoallergenic treats for oral hygiene. Fragrance-free and designed to help clean teeth and freshen breath with every bite.
product_descriptions.prod_171458: Functional treats to support urinary tract health. Contains ingredients like cranberry extract to help prevent urinary issues.
product_descriptions.prod_17278: Dental care treats for dogs with white coats. Helps reduce tartar and plaque buildup while supporting coat health.
product_descriptions.prod_17272: Functional treats for the health of hips and joints in dogs with white coats. Contains glucosamine and chondroitin for joint support.
product_descriptions.prod_47233: Grain-free dry food with chicken and turkey for puppies of all breeds. A high-protein formula to support active and growing puppies.
